SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.game.items

Interface Purchasable

All Known Implementing Classes:
TowerType, UpgradeItem, UpgradeItemFasterReload, UpgradeItemFillCart, UpgradeItemRepairTower, UpgradeItemSlowerCart
public interface Purchasable
Represents an item that is purchasable from the shop. Contains constant information used in the shop: name, cost, etc. Use .create() to create an actual instance of the item.
